description:
Deliver mood lighting to your picnic table, tent or adventure van. From energizing white, to a relaxing warm glow, the Alpenglow 250’s multicolour LEDs have a setting to suit the moment. You can also use the USB port to top up your other electronics.

  • White and colour LEDs
  • Lighting modes: high (4.5 hours), low (48 hours), cool, warm, 1 colour, multicolour (steady or party)
  • Dimming function dials in brightness
  • Single button or shake the lantern to cycle though modes
  • Dual sided design lights up 1 side or both
  • LED indicator shows charging progress and battery status
  • 1 USB port (type A) for powering other devices
  • Internal 3000mAh battery recharges via micro USB
  • Dimensions: 9.5 x 7.5cm
  • Folding hook on the bottom for hanging the lantern
name: BioLite Alpenglow 250 Lantern
